name: source-map-diff
description: Compare source maps to understand why a bundle changed in size.

scripts.lint: biome check src/index.ts src/source-map-diff.ts src/cli/index.ts src/cli/cli.ts --files-ignore-unknown=true
scripts.lint:fix: biome check --apply src/index.ts src/source-map-diff.ts src/cli/index.ts src/cli/cli.ts
scripts.format: biome format src/index.ts src/source-map-diff.ts src/cli/index.ts src/cli/cli.ts
scripts.format:fix: biome format --write src/index.ts src/source-map-diff.ts src/cli/index.ts src/cli/cli.ts

author: Dylan Greene
